text:
It is said that the great tengu has a power called 'clairvoyance'.
It is the vision to know the life and death of all living beings due to karma—

In my dream, I saw that disciple disappear into a burning building,
shot with a flaming arrow.

The time limit for it to burn down is soon approaching.
He will probably lament the world in those flames.

The disciple will probably not return
from that burning building alive.

I know the distant cause of that end.
—'Getting too close to one's own family'.

The art of war of the tengu, which Hogen taught to that disciple
as his master, is the principle of the sword of 'distance'.

It is also called the divine feet of the tengu,
and it is something that closes the distance in an instant and reduces it to zero.

That disciple used it freely on the battlefield
and made countless heroic tales known to the world,
such as the reverse drop of Ichi no Tani.

But that is what definitively made the disciple and his brother and vassals
misjudge their sense of distance.

He stepped into the other's territory that should not be touched.
Or should I say that he stepped on a landmine after closing the distance?

No matter how close they are... No, precisely because they are family,
there is a domain that cannot be entered without consequences.

That is not only for the disciple,
but also for Hogen, who is his master.

In the same world, in the same 'faith',
the fate of those with the same Role and Rule is the same.

No matter how much he regrets it, the past is the past.
He— cannot leap through time.

name: Direction Team
text:
Alright, this project is finally starting to see its end.
Everyone, just a little more effort!

Late at night on the day before the reopening of T.S.L.
In the construction work area, the staff were moving about busily.

name: Direction Team
text:
—I'm glad the work is done.
I can't thank the construction team enough.

name: Direction Team
text:
You were working all night, weren't you?
For the vibration countermeasures, was it?

name: Direction Team
text:
That's right, the vibration from the fireworks seemed
to reverberate inside the facility more than expected—

T.S.L. decided to carry out urgent renovation work in response
to the results of the fireworks impact survey conducted the other day.

The reopening day was safely met and the retest was completed,
and the staff were all busy carrying unnecessary materials to the temporary storage area.

name: Direction Team
text:
...Alright, this is the last one for now.
Good work, let's go take a shower. We have a luxurious—

name: Direction Team
text:
...Did something
just move over there?

name: Direction Team
text:
Eh...?
No, I didn't see anything.

name: Direction Team
text:
Maybe it was my imagination.
Pulling all-nighters is getting tough as I get older—

Chapter 4:
An Old Tengu's Gaze at the Opposite Shore's Fire

name: Cinderella
text:
Attention!
Fire platoon roll call, begin!!

name: Red Hood
text:
Yes, yes.
I'm the ace, number one!

name: Firefighting Students
text: Two, three, four!

name: Firefighting Students
text: Five, six!

name: Firefighting Students
text:
Seven, eight, nine!
All present, Captain... No, Chief!!

name: Cinderella
text:
You guys! It's been a while since we've had a real deployment,
but you haven't let your guard down, have you?

As a master and an instructor,
Cinderella gives a pep talk.

name: Cinderella
text:
It's my job to raise you into ash-covered ones
that I wouldn't be ashamed to send anywhere.

name: Cinderella
text:
Listen up, don't think I'll be able
to guide you forever, alright?

name: Cinderella
text:
It's precisely when you let your guard down like this
that unexpected disasters happen.

name: Cinderella
text:
Don't even give Hogen and his security team a chance to step in,
you all better handle it yourselves, alright?

name: Red Hood
text:
Speaking of the Security Chief, Sandra,
aren't things between you and him a little tense?

name: Cinderella
text:
Hmph, haven't I told you, Reddy?
That I once had a near-death experience with him?

name: Cinderella
text:
That's right, I think it was during a joint disaster prevention drill
between the police and the fire department or something—

name: Hogen
text:
...'Cinderella'?
No, no, whoever 'you' are?

At that time, Hogen, with his tengu eyes,
said so as soon as he saw Cinderella.

name: Red Hood
text:
W-What near-death experience?
What on earth happened, Sandra?

name: Cinderella
text:
Ahahaha, it's nothing.
He just stepped a little too far, that's all.

name: Cinderella
text:
But if you make a 'mistake' like stepping on your partner's shoes
while dancing, you have to be taught a lesson, right?

name: Cinderella
text:
Even dancing is something you do while measuring your distance.
It's not good enough to just step in as much as you can.

name: Cinderella
text:
Though, that dance wasn't bad.
I have to admit, that old man has talent.

name: Cinderella
text:
But if we get too close, it'll be the same thing all over again.
...That's the kind of relationship he and I have.

name: Hogen
text:
A-Achoo!
(...*shiver* *shiver* *shiver*...)

name: Security Staff
text:
Security Chief Hogen, are you feeling cold?
Shall I turn down the air conditioning a little?

name: Hogen
text:
No, no, some cute person somewhere
is probably talking about me.

name: Hogen
text:
—More importantly, I should be grateful that
you were able to be flexible with the shifts.

name: Security Staff
text:
No, no! Rather, I'm sorry that you have to stay on as a
member of security team even after the opening.

name: Hogen
text:
The reopening of the facility has attracted
a lot of attention from the citizens.

name: Hogen
text:
The more people there are, the greater the risk of trouble.
Not all visitors come for entertainment—

name: Hogen
text:
In any case, feel free to contact me if anything happens.
I'll be counting on you while I'm resting my wings.

name: Hogen
text:
...Well then, now I can secure some time
to go around the park with my disciple.

Hogen operates his device and sends a message
to [Player]'s chat, and laughs.

But that smile slowly fades, and his expression disappears.
As Hogen remembered the scene he saw in his dream this morning.

name: Hogen
text:
Physical distance is one thing, but
you mustn't close the distance of the heart... huh.

The day of T.S.L.'s reopening.
Although reservations were only made available by lottery,
the park was still plenty crowded.

And it was the first day for the staff as well.
Even though they had been trained, they were very busy with the crowds.

Meanwhile, [Player] and the other fire brigade members
were spending a quiet time at the standby area.

Red Hood and the others sent out invitations to play
to their other friends and acquaintances later on—

Until it was time to meet up, there was nothing in particular
for them to do, and so they were at a loss on what to do.

options.text: It's a good thing the fire brigade has nothing to do!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So bright, our firefighting junior is too good to be true...
A former man-eating wolf like me can't possibly compete.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: Just being able to stand by would give you a higher rating than Ulaanbaatar.

options.text: Cinderella, tell me a story from the past.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, I'm interested too!
Tell me, tell me, Sandra!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There were times I burned with revenge.
There were times my heart was burned by a love that only happened once.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...If you want to hear more of my old stories, you should bring me a souvenir, you inconsiderate person?

options.text: Red Hood, shall we run away together?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Shall we?
Under the midsummer blue sky...
Though it's underground, but to elope on a tropical beach—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—What are you talking about, Reddy!?
[Player], you, what did Hogen teach you to say things like that?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: That old man also suddenly steps on the gas, but you're just as bad, honestly...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But... It's a little exciting.
I don't dislike guys who propose out of the blue, you know?

name: Cinderella
text:
You've made plans to play with the others, haven't you?
It's almost time, so be patient.

name: Red Hood
text:
Oh, are you trying to make me and
[Player] go play by ourselves again!?

name: Cinderella
text:
I thought that was the plan?
There's nothing wrong with that, is there?

options.text: I want Cinderella to come too!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right, if we're going, I want Sandra to come too!
I'd be worried if we left her alone.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: So, if you don't mind, Sandra, I'd like you to come with us...

options.text: I'll stay behind this time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I wouldn't leave my junior behind to go play!?
Besides, we made a promise to meet up with everyone we know after this!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: This place has great fire prevention equipment, so it's okay if we don't all stay cooped up in the standby area.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'd still be worried leaving one person behind.
If you don't mind, Sandra, I'd like you to come with us...

options.text: Well, we're here for work...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: W-Well, if you put it that way, I can't really argue, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Look, during break time or something!
Sandra, you've been cooped up in here the whole time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: And when we fought the sharks the other day, I was lonely because you weren't with us, Sandra...!

name: Cinderella
text:
If you so wish for it, then alright.
You can take me wherever you want.

name: Red Hood
text:
Yeah, you're right.
Well, it doesn't hurt to just say it...

name: Red Hood
text:
—Eh, you'll go!?
R-really? I thought you'd say no.

name: Cinderella
text:
It's fine, I don't dislike it or anything.
And it doesn't seem like you're being considerate either.

name: Cinderella
text:
I can't leave this place without permission,
so I'll have to put a reserve unit in place before I go—

options.text: Conveniently timed.
I guess you've already made arrangements.
Stalking again?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Of course not!
I am always, only thinking about what you are thinking!

name: Cinderella
text:
Are you sure you can be here?
But then again, you'd be the busiest before the opening, right?

name: Oscar
text:
That's right. Unless an emergency occurs,
I've adjusted it so that all I have to do today is watch over...

name: Oscar
text:
The renewed T.S.L. is more than
just a workplace to me—

name: Oscar
text:
It's a paradise for me, where my fiction has become a reality,
and so I want to enjoy it as a guest myself!

name: Oscar
text:
In addition, if I can see the honest reactions of my friends and acquaintances,
there's nothing that would make me happier as a creator.

name: Oscar
text:
In short, I want feedback.
And as much as possible, if you will.
Will you do me the favor?

name: Cinderella
text:
If not just [Player] and Reddy, but even the site manager says so,
I can't just say no, can I?

options.text: If you ask, she'll accept...!?
As expected, you're good at inviting people.
Then, let's get going right away!

name: Red Hood
text:
It's a little early, but let's all go!
Thanks a bunch, Oscar-san!!

name: Oscar
text:
No, you were the ones who invited me in the first place.
I'm glad the three of you from the fire brigade could go out together.

name: Red Hood
text:
From now on, I'll try to invite
Sandra more persistently!

name: Cinderella
text:
You can, but don't overdo it!?
I'm already busy enough to turn to ash as it is!

name: Hei Long Yi Quan
text:
Hello, masters! Konpura~
Today, from the renewed T.S.L., the first review—

name: Saturnus
text:
—Marduk, you look great!
So, there's no harm with walking with a bit more confidence...!

name: Marduk
text:
I-I know.
I will conquer this summer's chaos as well!!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Amazing, amazing! It's so big!!
I've only ever seen islands in the southern sea in picture books!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hey, I know how you feel,
but don't run around! You'll get hurt!?

options.text: It's a huge success!
I see some familiar faces.
I'm getting crowd sick...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I know how you feel.
I was the one who brought you here, but I'm not used to it either...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
B-but...!
It's fun to talk with everyone, and I don't really mind the crowd!

name: Oscar
text:
The reservation tickets are sold out!
I'm sure the CEOs and owners will be satisfied.

name: Oscar
text:
If you get tired of the crowd,
I'll show you to the nearest VIP lounge!

name: Cinderella
text:
The nearest?
Are there really that many?

name: Red Hood
text:
Wow, and I'd thought our standby area
was already luxurious enough.

To get to the meeting place,
[Player] and the others walk through the lively park.

The group arrived earlier than the promised time,
but there was a familiar shadow at the landmark.

options.text: ...What happened?
I can pretty much guess, poisonous creature?
Oh, you're both early?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, I had less work than I thought.
I've been working consecutive shifts, so I left it to the other first aid staff today.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: I thought it would be nice to take a leisurely stroll by myself, and then I bumped into Yuma-kun.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Um, work, later, in afternoon.
So... It's okay.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-agagaga...
My body is numb, numb, so could you at least say something to me...!?

name: Oscar
text:
This is...
Quite a poisonous ad-lib, isn't it?

name: Red Hood
text:
Is it an ad-lib?
Is it okay to call this an ad-lib...?

name: Cinderella
text:
Ahahaha!
Hogen, what a state you're in!!

name: Hogen
text:
Well now... That was a terrible experience.
I was just trying to have a little skinship—

name: Shennong
text:
If he wasn't knocked out by the poison, I'd think it was the wind.
That's how fast he was. He's used to it.

options.text: Where did you touch...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hmph, I know my distance, so I just checked a little of the part hidden by the aloha shirt.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: With a speed that could be mistaken for the wind, you just stuck your hand in...?

options.text: Give me your thoughts.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course.
This time, I just checked a little of the part hidden by the aloha shirt—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My body is poisonous all over, yes?
Danger, do not touch, so I hope you've learned your lesson.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player], if, want to pat, pat me, woof woof, awoo!

options.text: (Ready your device)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-hey, hey!
As always, your judgment is a little too quick!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: I just checked with my own body to see if there was anything dangerous hidden under the aloha shirt, that's all!

name: Shennong
text:
What a waste of talent...
And to think it's so subtle that it's not worth getting angry about.

name: Shennong
text:
No, in the first place,
I'd appreciate it if you didn't check it as you'd wish!?

name: Shennong
text:
...Though, I guess I can understand.
I can't help but taste it when I see a wild plant I don't know—

name: Red Hood
text:
Ehh...
That's pretty out there in its own way...

name: Hogen
text:
Hmm, a beautiful rose has thorns,
a colorful tropical creature has poison... I've learned something today.

options.text: Actually, I also—
Genius and criminal are two sides of the same coin...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, yes, to be a genius is always to commit a sin.
I am no exception to that, you see.

options.text: I want to go play soon.

name: Cinderella
text:
—You guys, aren't you going to go around the park?
That old man, I'll turn him to ash if it comes down to it.

name: Yuma
text:
That's right, I, still have work.
Until then, want to play, with everyone, as much as possible.

name: Oscar
text:
Oh my, I seem to have gotten a little carried away
and have forgotten what I have come here for.

name: Oscar
text:
The stars of the park, of my stage,
allow me to personally guide you.

name: Hogen
text:
That's very kind of you. As a security team member, I have a grasp of the map,
but I have almost no prior knowledge of the facility's outline.

name: Cinderella
text:
Now that you mention it, I'm in the same boat.
Last time it was a 'play' disguised as a guide, wasn't it?

name: Shennong
text:
[Player], Yuma-kun.
Is there anywhere you two want to go?

name: Yuma
text:
I, only know, Am-sama's live show.
So, want to be, taken around, more.

options.text: I want to look around the park.
I think I could go to the pool as many times as it takes.
I-I can't decide...!

name: Oscar
text:
In that case, may I recommend the
'T.S.L. Stamp Rally - The Treasure of the Southern Isles'?

name: Oscar
text:
As the name suggests,
you go around to each spot and collect stamps.

name: Oscar
text:
Some require you to ride an attraction,
and there are also spots you have to find based on hints.

name: Oscar
text:
Collect all the stamps to get a souvenir!!
...How does that sound?

name: Red Hood
text:
Wow! I like the atmosphere here,
so I was just thinking I'd like to explore.

name: Yuma
text:
In that case, [Player],
a little, favor to ask.

Yuma takes out a harness from his bag,
puts it on, and hands the lead to [Player].

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], here.
With this, take me, around.

name: Hogen
text:
To think you're handing over the reins yourself.
...Then we must make sure it doesn't break on the way.

After receiving the 'treasure map' at the designated place,
the tour of T.S.L. began according to the written content.

options.text: The location of the next stamp is—
I have no idea.
The view here is nice!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Plants, all real. Buildings, too, only natural materials.
No-swim area, look, fish there—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, that's my personal touch.
I incorporated natural objects as much as possible, and reproduced the buildings as they are.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Mixing truth into fiction increases its credibility...
I simply applied that to the theme park.

name: Cinderella
text:
The scenery is amazing, it's almost indistinguishable from nature.
But more than that, I don't like that I can't solve this riddle!

name: Oscar
text:
This riddle was made by a
riddle creator named Sphinx-kun, you see—

name: Cinderella
text:
Sphinx... in Tokyo?
No wonder even I am struggling with this.

name: Shennong
text:
Hmm, it should be around here,
but I don't see anything that looks like it.

name: Red Hood
text:
I can't do it anymore,
I don't understand it at all!!

name: Shennong
text:
How about we take a break for now?
Let's have a drink while looking at the scenery and clear our heads.

name: Hogen
text:
A fine idea.
Then, I shall go buy some for everyone.

name: Yuma
text:
Is it alright? I, my and [Player]'s share, buy.
Everyone's too, buy then...

name: Hogen
text:
Hahaha, that's very thoughtful of you.
That's why I want to take care of you.

options.text: Thank you, Hogen.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, that one word is enough for me.
Well then, I'll send you a picture of the menu when I get to the shop.

options.text: I'll repay you with my body—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hohoho?
Then I shall look forward to it—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What was the number for the security team again?
Or, would an injection be quicker?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's just a bad joke...!
No, it's a tengu joke!!

options.text: (Tell him what drink you want)

text:
Hogen leaves [Player] and the others,
who are trying to solve the riddle, and goes to buy drinks alone.

In the meantime, [Player] and the others
decided to take a break.

options.text: What book are you reading, Shennong?

dialogue_after_selection.text: Shennong, who seemed to be trying to get away from the riddle for a while, had a book open in his hand.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Shennong-sensei, what book, is that?
If, biology book, I know, maybe.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This is a book on psychotherapy written by a sports doctor from Yoyogi Academy.
In short, it's a study in my spare time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: I was originally only good at treating the body, but since I became a school nurse, I can't exactly use that excuse anymore.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I don't understand that riddle at all.
So I thought that if I reset my mind, I might see something.

options.text: Cinderella, you have a stern look on your face...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: Wow, Sandra trying to solve a riddle with a serious face, that's a little fresh!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...It's not that anyone asked me to, but it annoys me that I can't solve Sphinx's riddle.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: To think you're acquainted with Sphinx-kun, it's surprising how things are connected.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, yes.
I don't know if the one in Tokyo is the 'Sphinx' I know, though.

options.text: Oscar, give me a hint for the riddle.

name: Oscar
text:
Hmph... Then, to be considerate of spoilers,
let me just say that the current move is as the management and creator intended...

name: Oscar
text:
Of course, I made it with the premise that it would be solved?
However, whether it's a straight path is another matter.

name: Yuma
text:
Oscar, knew, answer?
Know, but, with us, still thinking...?

name: Yuma
text:
...No, I, Am-sama's tour, setlist spoilers, no.
No, absolutely not.

name: Yuma
text:
Oscar, said, move, as intended.
Then maybe, before here, have to go, another place, no?

name: Hogen
text:
Oh, they're getting excited.
From the looks of it, did they realize they shouldn't be here yet?

name: Hogen
text:
A lively time with nothing special going on,
it's a pleasant feeling to look down on it from above.

Hogen muttered to himself,
holding a drink.

Then he noticed them and hurried
over to them, waving his hand.

After that, [Player] and the others continued
to collect stamps and ride attractions.

name: Hercules
text:
This attraction is for six people.
Since there are seven of you, I would like you to split into two groups—

name: Hogen
text:
Then, shall I take pictures of everyone
on the attraction from the outside?

name: Hogen
text:
I have plans to come with my students,
so I'll save the attraction for that time.

name: Tadatomo
text:
The end of the line for the 3-star Nisroch food truck is here,
the line for gelato is over there—

name: Shennong
text:
As I expected, there's quite a line everywhere.
It looks like it'll be a struggle to secure a seat.

name: Cinderella
text:
There are a lot of food trucks.
If you don't want to waste time, you don't have to stick to this one—?

name: Hogen
text:
Hahaha, the Tengu of Kurama is not just for show.
Look down from a high blind spot and strike at the gap.
The foundation of my art of war.

name: Red Hood
text:
I-I see!
...So what does that mean!?

name: Hogen
text:
I have been entrusted with securing a seat.
In return, I would like you to buy me a meal.

name: Red Hood
text:
I'm really indebted to you, Hogen-san!
Unlike with Sandra, I feel like I'm being watched over.

name: Cinderella
text:
I'm so sorry about that, Reddy!
Have I always been leaving you behind?

options.text: It's so unlike you to be so well-behaved.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You do know that I'm an adult, [Player]?
Even I have those kinds of ennui days.

options.text: I'll take the seat...
Hogen, you look strangely wistful— What's wrong?

name: Shennong
text:
I've been playing the guardian role all the time,
so I couldn't help but be spoiled, but I'm an adult too.

name: Shennong
text:
I'll get the seats.
I feel bad for leaving it all to you.

name: Oscar
text:
No, in that case, shall I have my servant
prepare both the seats and the meal, dear Security Chief?

name: Hogen
text:
No, I have no intention of overstepping the bounds of a general customer.
I'll refrain being an old man that makes the younger generation worry too much.

name: Cinderella
text:
Hey Hogen, is that a jab at me!?
Or... have you gotten sick from eating something bad?

name: Hogen
text:
Hahaha, my body is in perfect health!
No matter what I do, or what is done to me, I will not die.

name: Hogen
text:
Now, go on.
It's almost lunchtime, so the lines will get longer.

options.text: We ended up leaving it to Hogen.
He seems to have something on his mind—
A little tired... No, his body should be fine, right?

name: Oscar
text:
Will you forcibly rip off his mask?
I wouldn't recommend being too rough with others, though.

name: Red Hood
text:
That's right. If you step into someone else's private matters,
Sandra would get angry too.

name: Cinderella
text:
If it's not needed of you, it's best not to do it.
If someone were to ask me, I'll answer in earnest...
Though, it seems we have no time.

name: Yuma
text:
...Hogen, seeing, something.
Something, not here, now, feels like.

name: Yuma
text:
Hogen, heart, and body, far.
Distance, different, cannot go back, time...

options.text: Yuma's saying difficult things.
Is there anything I can do to help?
It annoys that my Master's not feeling well.

name: Shennong
text:
—If that's the case, I have an idea.
Well, it's also a bit of a payback for earlier.

name: Shennong
text:
If the cause is that he's seeing too much,
then maybe, he 'just shouldn't see'.

While waiting in line to order,
the group devises a plan with Shennong at the center.

name: Cinderella
text:
Oh, what a good team you make.
I didn't think I'd be able to get involved that much, but—

name: Cinderella
text:
...I've become a little more interested in what lies ahead.
Really, the world doesn't go as planned, does it?

Once upon a time, in the capital of the otherworld Land of Wa,
there was an exorcist who served as a public servant.

He possessed a skill revered as the ancestor of swordsmanship,
and his fame as a master of military strategy was known throughout the capital.

Eventually, the court graciously granted him a book on
the secrets of military strategy, and appointed him as its guardian.

And, there was a legend that if one could decipher that secret book,
one could obtain a power beyond human comprehension.

A certain warrior heard of that legend.
The hero of the Land of Wa— appeared before the exorcist.

name: Red Hood
text:
Why do I have to be in the front row
for the roller coaster!? Aaaaahhh!!!

name: Cinderella
text:
Ahahaha!
Isn't this quite fun? We should try it more often, shouldn't we?

name: Shennong
text:
The view from up high is even better.
...Are you alright, Yuma-kun? Look, Oscar-san is over there.

The group rides the roller coaster in the park.
This one also had an even number of seats, so Oscar became the photographer—

name: Hogen
text:
Oh, this unique pressure, this floating feeling,
how very addicting... Yahoo—!

—Saying that he should experience the rides for security reasons,
Hogen, who was persuaded... or rather, forced to ride, screamed.

options.text: (Wave with an air of composure)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
As expected of my beloved disciple, you're so calm!
Oh, Oscar-dono is over there!

options.text: (Look for Oscar)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
As expected of my beloved disciple, you're so calm!
Oh, Oscar-dono is over there!

options.text: (Shout as loud as you can)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
To hear such a voice from my beloved disciple...
That alone was worth riding with you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Look, [Player].
Oscar-dono is holding a camera over there.

name: Hogen
text:
It's a shame that I can't touch anything,
not even your hand, because of the safety bar—

name: Oscar
text:
Well, well, welcome back.
I took some good pictures, so I'll send them to your device.

name: Oscar
text:
Now, what kind of spot would you like to go to next?
I'll come up with the perfect plan.
